casebody.data:
In the MATTER OF: A.P. No. 145PA17-2 Supreme Court of North Carolina. May 9, 2019 Anne C. Wright, Attorney at Law, Boone, for Powell, Kylah. Christopher C. Peace, Attorney at Law, Keith T. Roberson, Attorney at Law, for Mecklenburg County DSS. Matthew Wunsche, Attorney at Law, Durham, for GAL.

ORDER

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 11th of September 2018 by Guardian ad Litem for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Dissolved by order of the Court in conference, this the 9th of May 2019."

Upon consideration of the petition filed by Guardian ad Litem on the 11th of September 2018 for Writ of Supersedeas of the judgment of the Court of Appeals, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 9th of May 2019."

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 11th of September 2018 by Guardian ad Litem in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 9th of May 2019."

Davis, J. recused
